Let's use place value blocks to build each number and see which ones equal $\purpleD{2}\blueE7\maroonD1$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/3e874c0187191d15a497808e8d260a6169e47d09)

$\blueE{22}$ tens $+~\blueE7$ tens $+\maroonD1$ one

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/19ed506ad9a3ae388a6b2c0e2825ff7a6f4513bd)

$\blueE{220} + \blueE{70} + \maroonD1 = 291$

$\blueE{22}$ tens $+~\blueE7$ tens $+~\maroonD1$ one $\neq271$

$\purpleD1$ hundred $+~\blueE{12}$ tens$+~\maroonD1$ one

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f48a45bddfec02cbcf1487c4e07de179f7033c32)

$\purpleD{100} + \blueE{120} + \maroonD1 = 221$

$\purpleD1$ hundred $+~\blueE{12}$ tens$+~\maroonD1$ one $\neq271$

$\purpleD2$ hundreds $+~\blueE7$ tens  $+~\maroonD1$ one

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/2540d4ef21d5ee11d4ae8444ddbac63ed3d88e66)

$\purpleD{200} + \blueE{70} + \maroonD1 = 271$

$\purpleD2$ hundreds $+~\blueE7$ tens $+~\maroonD1$ one $=271$

These expressions are equivalent to $271$:

* $27$ tens $+1$ one
* $2$ hundreds $+~7$ tens $+~1$ one

question.content:
**Which expressions represent the same amount as $271$?**
